meanings.sent1: She initiated the game by pressing the start button.
meanings.sent2: The teacher initiated the lesson with a brief introduction.
meanings.sent3: The cat initiated a playful chase with the ball of yarn.
meanings.sent4: The sun initiated its descent below the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The engine initiated a loud roar as it started up.

meanings.definition: To introduce someone to a particular activity or group
meanings.sent1: He initiated his friend into the world of video gaming.
meanings.sent2: The mentor initiated the new employee to the team.
meanings.sent3: The clown initiated the audience into a game of charades.
meanings.sent4: The guide initiated the tourists into the local customs.
meanings.sent5: The coach initiated the young athletes into the team spirit.

meanings.definition: To admit someone into a secret or sacred society
meanings.sent1: The elder initiated the young apprentice into the ancient order.
meanings.sent2: She initiated her best friend into the exclusive club.
meanings.sent3: The magician initiated the curious child into the magic circle.
meanings.sent4: The priest initiated the new members into the sacred ritual.
meanings.sent5: The leader initiated the chosen few into the inner circle.
